tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sculpture_resources (
    resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_name VARCHAR(255),
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    technique_used VARCHAR(255),
    era VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE SculptureHistory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    sculpture_title VARCHAR(255),
    year_created INT,
    materials_used TEXT,
    technique_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (technique_id) REFERENCES SculptureTechniques(id)
);

CREATE TABLE sculptures (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    artist VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    creation_year INT,
    material VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE artists (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    nationality VARCHAR(100),
    birth_year INT,
    death_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE learning_resources (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    resource_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    author VARCHAR(255),
    publication_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE resource_mappings (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id INT NOT NULL,
    resource_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (sculpture_id) REFERENCES sculptures (id),
    FOREIGN KEY (resource_id) REFERENCES learning_resources (id)
);
